comment: Warm, inviting seating arrangement with layered lighting and textured walls. Great for family gatherings.
Elegant pendant lighting with gold accents, perfect for adding a touch of luxury to dining or lounge areas.
Subtle wall textures and non-shiny flooring create a cozy, sophisticated atmosphere.
Lush landscaping and water feature inspiration for the garden and patio integration.
Multi-level bedroom layout with built-in cabinetry and study/activity space.
Bright, airy kitchen with ample natural light and functional storage.
